entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
